name: makinacorpus/drupal-sf-dic
description: Brings the vanilla Symfony 3 depency inject container component to Drupal 7 seamlessly along with a limited compatibility layer with Drupal 8 API

suggests.jdorn/sql-formatter: Prettifies SQL queries in the WebProfiler debug pane
suggests.makinacorpus/php-acl: Integrates with PHP ACL and send node access collect events, requires ^1.1.0
suggests.monolog/monolog: Integrates the Drupal 8 logger to monolog
suggests.symfony/symfony: Replaces Symfony components with the full stack framework and brings everything into Drupal
suggests.symfony/twig-bundle: Allow the twig engine to work seamlessly with Drupal themes
